context: Arm Holdings plc is a semiconductor IP and architecture licensing company focused on processor architecture licensing for mobile, IoT, automotive, and data centers. IPO at $54.5B valuation. AI and data center momentum. Arm-based servers growing.

competitors.name: AMD
competitors.notes: x86 competitor gaining data center share

competitors.name: Qualcomm
competitors.notes: Customer and competitor with Nuvia acquisition

competitors.name: Apple
competitors.notes: Custom ARM silicon for all products
